product_description: Stretchy, moisture-wicking DryTec fabric keeps up with you all day in a sporty striped polo that offers added UV protection in the sun.
product_details_and_care:
Stretchy, moisture-wicking DryTec fabric keeps up with you all day in a sporty striped polo that offers added UV protection in the sun.
Button half-placket
Spread collar
Short sleeves
UPF 50+ sun protection
Moisture-wicking fabric engineered to keep you dry and comfortable

Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported

product_size_info:
True to size.
Considered a Classic fit; cut generously with extra room through the chest, armholes and sides.
